effect_entries.effect:
Held: Increases the power of the holder's Water moves by 20%.
Held by a Multitype Pokémon: Holder's type becomes Water.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Water-Type moves from holder do 20% more damage. Changes Arceus's and Judgment's type to Water.

flavor_text_entries.text:
みずの　タイプの　石盤。
持たせると　みずタイプの
技の　威力が　強まる。

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It’s a stone tablet that boosts the
power of Water-type moves.

Strumento da dare a un Pokémon.
Lastra di pietra che potenzia le mosse
di tipo Acqua.

Incienso de exótico aroma que hace que el
Pokémon que lo lleve esté aturdido y se mueva
más despacio.

Ein Item zum Tragen. Diese Steintafel verstärkt
Attacken vom Typ Wasser.

Objet à tenir. Une tablette en pierre augmentant
la puissance des capacités de type Eau.

물타입의 석판.
지니게 하면 물타입
기술의 위력이 강해진다.

みずの　タイプの　せきばん。
もたせると　みずタイプの
わざの　いりょくが　つよまる。

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It is a stone tablet that boosts the
power of Water-type moves.

It is a stone tablet that boosts the
power of Water-type moves.

augmentant la puissance des capacités
de type Eau.
